ygData.subject: RE: Patch Update today
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Is it possible they fully fleshed this out and made it level-dependent whether or not Accel breaks root?  The code is already there for the invisibility
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 28 Sep 1999 John.Curry@... wrote:
>
> I have heared many people mention that Selo's no longer breaks root. Now I
> thought that might be wrong, because I was breaking Ghoul Root, in Unrest
> and Oasis, 2 days after the patch that caused it. Even after doing this
> probably a half a dozen times. I chalked it up to conisidence. But last
> night I was fighting Orcs in Highpass, and I got rooted a couple of times
> from... it was either Fanatic or Medic... when I clicked Selos's just to
> see, both times I was released right when I got the boot symbol. Has anyone
> else noticed this. Or has anyone else been unable to get unrooted? Am I
> just really lucky, or perhaps someone has an explanation.

Is it possible they fully fleshed this out and made it
level-dependent whether or not Accel breaks root? The code is
already there for the invisibility stuff - kodiaks could see
through my enchanter's invisibility until he reached level 15,
which is approximately their average level. So maybe Accel
will break a root cast on you by a lower level mob, but not a
higher level mob?

I'll have to talk my friends into visiting the arena some
time...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
